std::suspend_always initial_suspend() const noexcept;
}}

Informs that {{ltt std|cpp/coroutine/generator}} always starts lazily (in suspended state).

Equivalent to {{c|return std::suspend_always{};}}.

===Return value===
An [[cpp/coroutine/suspend_always|awaitable]] object.
